trans-unit.source: A predictive solution for credit risk with Machine Learning | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: A predictive solution for credit risk with Machine Learning | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: A detailed walkthrough showing how to create a predictive analytics solution for credit risk assessment in Azure Machine Learning Studio.
trans-unit.target: A detailed walkthrough showing how to create a predictive analytics solution for credit risk assessment in Azure Machine Learning Studio.

trans-unit.source: Walkthrough: Develop a predictive analytics solution for credit risk assessment in Azure Machine Learning
trans-unit.target: Walkthrough: Develop a predictive analytics solution for credit risk assessment in Azure Machine Learning

trans-unit.source: Suppose you need to predict an individual's credit risk based on the information they give on a credit application.
trans-unit.target: Suppose you need to predict an individual's credit risk based on the information they give on a credit application.

trans-unit.source: Credit risk assessment is a complex problem, of course, but let's simplify the parameters of the question a bit.
trans-unit.target: Credit risk assessment is a complex problem, of course, but let's simplify the parameters of the question a bit.

trans-unit.source: Then, we can use it as an example of how you can use Microsoft Azure Machine Learning with Machine Learning Studio and the Machine Learning web service to create such a predictive analytics solution.
trans-unit.target: Then, we can use it as an example of how you can use Microsoft Azure Machine Learning with Machine Learning Studio and the Machine Learning web service to create such a predictive analytics solution.

trans-unit.source: In this detailed walkthrough, we'll follow the process of developing a predictive analytics model in Machine Learning Studio and then deploying it as an Azure Machine Learning web service.
trans-unit.target: In this detailed walkthrough, we'll follow the process of developing a predictive analytics model in Machine Learning Studio and then deploying it as an Azure Machine Learning web service.

trans-unit.source: We'll start with publicly available credit risk data, develop and train a predictive model based on that data, and then deploy the model as a web service that can be used by others for credit risk assessment.
trans-unit.target: We'll start with publicly available credit risk data, develop and train a predictive model based on that data, and then deploy the model as a web service that can be used by others for credit risk assessment.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP] To download and print a diagram that gives an overview of the capabilities of Machine Learning Studio, see [Overview diagram of Azure Machine Learning Studio capabilities](machine-learning-studio-overview-diagram.md).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP] To download and print a diagram that gives an overview of the capabilities of Machine Learning Studio, see [Overview diagram of Azure Machine Learning Studio capabilities](machine-learning-studio-overview-diagram.md).

trans-unit.source: To create a credit risk assessment solution, we'll follow these steps:
trans-unit.target: To create a credit risk assessment solution, we'll follow these steps:

trans-unit.source: This walkthrough is based on a simplified version of the [Binary Classfication: Credit risk prediction](../machine-learning-sample-credit-risk-prediction.md) sample experiment in the [Cortana Analytics Gallery](http://gallery.cortanaanalytics.com/).
trans-unit.target: This walkthrough is based on a simplified version of the [Binary Classfication: Credit risk prediction](../machine-learning-sample-credit-risk-prediction.md) sample experiment in the [Cortana Analytics Gallery](http://gallery.cortanaanalytics.com/).
